page.title: 12Events
page.content: The main summer events are the{Rose {Queen Parade}and{Hawkshead Show,}which does not include sports but is agriculture and horticulture with a most extensive section of cookery and handicrafts. The 1985 show had so much rain that the few spectators were let in free! At most outdoor functions there are{hound trails.}Carefully bred, highly trained and remarkably fed hounds race over an artificially laid trail. Bookmakers are always present on these occasions. There are regular displays of{morris and folk {dancing}in the village. In winter evening classes and drama take over, culminating in the{drama festival. Other organizations run eagerly anticipated Christmas parties. At all these events meetings between relatives and friends are as important as the actual entertainment.
